thread.title: Raees Ka Dimaag Aur Daring! Here's the second dialogue promo from SRK starrer Raees
thread.title_full: Raees Ka Dimaag Aur Daring! Here's the second dialogue promo from SRK starrer Raees

author: Aishwarya V
title: Raees Ka Dimaag Aur Daring! Here's the second dialogue promo from SRK starrer Raees

persons.name: baniye ka dimaag aur miyanbhai ki daring

text: January 13, 2017 Aishwarya V 16491 reads 9 comments The second dialogue promo from Shah Rukh Khan starrer Raees is out. This video features the most loved dialogue, Baniye Ka Dimaag Aur Miyanbhai Ki Daring, that was unveiled in the first teaser of the film which was out in the year 2015. In the dialogue promo, SRK and his right hand played by Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub are planning to start their own illegal business of selling alcohol in Gujarat. SRK is seen sporting a '70s look with his trademark glasses for the film. One will also see him doing his killer action moves while bashing the bad guys. King Khan took to his Twitter and posted the video with a caption saying, " Raees bano , dimaag aur daring ke saath . #RaeesKaDimaagAurDaring"
